thread.title: Amrita Arora Posted This Super Hot Photo Of Kareena Kapoor Khan On Instagram
thread.title_full: Amrita Arora Posted This Super Hot Photo Of Kareena Kapoor Khan On Instagram

author: Priyam Saha
title: Amrita Arora Posted This Super Hot Photo Of Kareena Kapoor Khan On Instagram
text:
A post shared by Amrita Arora (@amuaroraofficial) on Mar 2, 2017 at 1:11pm PST 
Amrita Arora and Kareena Kapoor Khan have been BFFs for years now and we love that even though Bebo isn’t on social media, we get to see unseen photos of Kareena all the time. Amrita posted a photo with Kareena and Malaika Arora on her Instagram and as usual only one thing comes to mind when we see our faveourite girl squad – girls just wanna have fun! 6
